title: Danny Zelisko: "All Excess"
description: Michael's conversation with longtime concert promoter Danny Zelisko, author of "All Exce$$: Occupation Concert Promoter." Original air date 7 May 2021. The book was published on 1 January 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Danny Zelisko)
